name: UIAccessibilityScrollDirection
desc: The direction of a scrolling action.

items.name: case right
items.desc: The user is scrolling to the right.

items.name: case left
items.desc: The user is scrolling to the left.

items.name: case next
items.desc: The user is scrolling to the next view in an ordered set of views.

items.name: case previous
items.desc: The user is scrolling to the previous view in an ordered set of views.
